sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react" export default class PreviewComponent extends Component { state = { name: "", ingridents: "", desc: "", type: "", process: [] } saveSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.addPost(this.state) } onChangeHandaler = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } render() { return (
